title: Trump, Putin to talk this week as Russia- Ukraine ceasefire negotiations continue
shortDescription: Special envoy Steve Witkoff said he expects the discussion to be "positive" and a ceasefire to come soon in the war between Russia and Ukraine.

title: Trump's treasury secretary says there are 'no guarantees' about a recession
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told NBC on Sunday he is not worried about the stock market, despite a tumultuous week.

title: He voted for Trump. Then ICE detained his wife.
shortDescription: ICE's deportation actions signal that anyone who isn't a U.S. citizen is 'at risk â€“ period,' immigration attorney says.

title: 'That's a lie': Judges keep calling out the Trump administration
shortDescription: Several judges across the U.S. admonished the Trump administration this week for lying and 'cherry picking' data in its explanations for massive changes to the federal government.

title: Trump hates waste, fraud and abuse. For schools, they may get worse.
shortDescription: President Trump has promised to rid the government of "waste, fraud and abuse." But he's fired many of the people who look for it in schools.

title: These 7 federal agencies just lost funding following a Trump order
shortDescription: In an executive order, President Donald Trump deemed the seven federal agencies as "unnecessary."

title: Trump orders airstrikes on Houthi militants in Yemen
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Saturday ordered U.S. airstrikes on Iran-backed Houthis in Yemen, while issuing a new warning against the militants.

title: Trump administration weighs travel ban on dozens of countries: Memo
shortDescription: The move harkens back to President Donald Trump's first term ban on travelers from seven majority-Muslim nations.

title: Trump targets law firm Paul Weiss in expanding attack on lawyers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued an executive order targeting law firm Paul Weiss' contracts, citing its past hire of an ex-prosecutor critical of Trump.

title: Trump signs funding bill to avert shutdown
shortDescription: President Trump signed a funding bill that keeps the government open through September, averting a shutdown after a drama-filled week on Capitol Hill.

title: Trump cuts Voice of America with order, employees put on leave
shortDescription: The parent company of Voice of America, U.S. Agency for Global Media, oversees all nonmilitary, international broadcasting.

title: Judge blocks Trump's use of 1798 law, but some migrants still removed
shortDescription: A judge temporarily blocked President Donald Trump from using a 1798 law to toughen immigration enforcement but Venezuelans were deported anyway.

title: In Iowa, Tim Walz says Democrats must answer Americans' 'primal scream'
shortDescription: Tim Walz held a town hall in Des Moines as he tours swing districts where vulnerable Republicans are not holding public town halls of their own.

title: Trump shares article with pink triangle symbol: Why it was alarming for some
shortDescription: An article shared by President Trump featured an upside-down pink triangle, crossed out by a red "no" symbol. Why LGBTQ+ and Jewish advocates are alarmed.

title: Fed up with Trump's America, Canadians are staying home, boycotting
shortDescription: Relations have gotten so bad Canadians have been booing the American National Anthem during hockey games.

title: Here's why Trump can't abolish Education Department single-handedly
shortDescription: While Trump has abolished other agencies by executive order, he can't end the Education Department on his own because Congress created it in statute.

title: Firings, tariffs and Teslas: Donald Trump shakes up Washington
shortDescription: Financial markets were in a tailspin after Trump fired thousands of federal employees and slapped tariffs on imports. Here's what could come next.

title: Democrats livid as Schumer, 9 other senators vote to avoid shutdown
shortDescription: House Democrats and activists are railing against Senate Democrats as they advance GOP funding bill.

title: Shutdown averted: Senate passes funding bill
shortDescription: One crisis was avoided as a midnight deadline loomed to keep the government funded.

title: Trump officials cheer 'self-deportation' of pro-Palestinian protester
shortDescription: The unusual decision to post the video on social media reflects the attention Trump has given pro-Palestinian protesters at Columbia.
